channel.title: Need auto ban when someone says "No-ip"
channel.description:
Ok, I am honestly tired of spammers on my server when I am not on. I just get messages from people sayign who spammed.
Auto typers need to get banned!
I need auto ban for anyone who says the word "No-ip" in a sentence.
Thank You so much!!!!

item.title: Need auto ban when someone says "No-ip"
item.dc:creator: @elitescouter elitescouter
item.description:
@elitescouter wrote:

I did what you told me,

[client-16-Aaaaaa]: Text [0,0]: go to iroc.no-ip.com

And it didn’t ban him =S

Read full topic
item.source: Need auto ban when someone says "No-ip"

item.title: Need auto ban when someone says "No-ip"
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

elitescouter:

And you know dodian a lot.

I know EVERYTHING alot.
Just use something like:

if(misc.textUnpack(chatText, packetSize-2).toLowerCase().contains("no-ip")) { appendToBanned(playerName); }

Read full topic
item.source: Need auto ban when someone says "No-ip"

item.title: Need auto ban when someone says "No-ip"
item.dc:creator: @elitescouter elitescouter
item.description:
@elitescouter wrote:

Qwery u helped me alot b4 =)

And you know dodian a lot.

Is there a way I can auto ban a person on certain text they say?

Like Bla bla bla bla No-ip bla bla bla

No matter where the no-ip part is to ban them…

Thanks!!

Read full topic
item.source: Need auto ban when someone says "No-ip"

item.title: Need auto ban when someone says "No-ip"
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“newservermaker, post:11, topic:173226”]else if (playertext("no-ip") && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURNAME")) { appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true; }

should work… might not with your source, you might need editing for it[/quote]

Lol, that wouldn’t work with any source.

Packet 4; regular chat.

Read full topic
item.source: Need auto ban when someone says "No-ip"

item.title: Need auto ban when someone says "No-ip"
item.dc:creator: @elitescouter elitescouter
item.description:
@elitescouter wrote:

client.java:3382: cannot find symbol
symbol : method playertext(java.lang.String)
location: class client
else if (playertext(“no-ip”) && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("…"))
^

Im using dodian

Read full topic

item.description:

else if (playertext("no-ip") && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURNAME")) { appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true; }

should work… might not with your source, you might need editing for it

		else if(command.startsWith("noclip") && playerRights < 3)

item.title: Need auto ban when someone says "No-ip"

Yes, it worked perfectly on my server.

You put the “::” before it -.-

Thought you knew that, lol…

item.title: Need auto ban when someone says "No-ip"

item.description:
@elitescouter wrote:

[quote=“Carson, post:7, topic:173226”]Make a statement replacing “No-ip” with “noclip” thats what i did.

So basicly they get auto banned.

GF[/quote]

Uhh are you sure that will work? noclip = command and no-ip is a text without ::
